titleStmt.title: An introduction to astronomy and geography being a plain and easie treatise of the globes : in VII parts ... / by William Leybourn.
titleStmt.author: Leybourn, William, 1626-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Robert Morden and William Berry ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.

(from t.p.) I. The definitions of the lines, circles, &c. upon the globe or sphere -- II. The problems in astronomy methodically digested -- III. The several affections of triangles, and their solution upon the globe -- IV. The whole art of dyalling -- V. The erection of an astrological figure of the heavens -- VI. & VII. The explanation and uses of the terrestrial globe, with a brief geographical and hydrographical description of the earth and water.
